Message:
The first person a swindler
fools is always themself.

All the guilt that comes
with lying would just get
in the way of the job.
“I need to do this to survive!”

We make ourselves believe
whatever excuse we need
to get by.

But...watching this
“good person circus”
unfold in front of me
is so suffocating.

And just when I thought
getting closer to the Holy See
would finally free me from
this hell...
